context.p: Follow these steps to enable monitoring:

li.p: Select Infrastructure from the navigation bar.
Click the device name in the device list.
Expand Monitoring Templates, and then select Device from the left panel.
Select Bind Templates from the Action menu.
Add the HttpMonitor template to the list of selected templates, and then click Submit.

note.p: Prior to Zenoss 2.4, this template was not available. If your version is prior to Zenoss 2.4 you must create the template, data source and graphs manually. For more information, refer to .

taskbody.result: The HttpMonitor template is added to the list of monitoring templates. You can now begin collecting Web server metrics from the device.
